title: Food safety certifications (HACCP, organic, kosher, halal, vegetarian, vegan)
dataVerified: Producer name, facility location, certification body, certificate number, certification type, issue date, expiration date
dataVisibleAfterVerification: Shows the issuer domain and the responder text (e.g., "Valid ID" or "Denied").
rationale: Domain binding prevents fake certification bodies. Consumer trust and verification at point of purchase. Prevents fraudulent organic/kosher/halal claims. Restaurants and food manufacturers can display certificates without risk of forgery.
